overview:
Entrepreneurial action is the engine for economic and social development.

Entrepreneurial action means conscious risk taking with the goal of attaining economic success. Nowadays, entrepreneurs move in global markets, but also shoulder a global responsibility.

A vigorous business can only exist in a healthy environment. Prosperous economic life requires constant structural change processes, creativity, and its implementation â€“ innovation.

Today, these processes take place in an environment characterized by the reciprocal relationships among research, the economy, ecology, culture, and social commitment.

The Business Angels Club supports entrepreneurial action, which makes it possible actively to help fashion a constantly renewing society worth living in, with attractive jobs, products and services.

We support entrepreneurs and entrepreneurial personalities in the construction and development of economically sustainable organizations. In doing so, we provide resource oriented sponsoring â€“ with knowledge, money, and personal connections.

For us, our services are an investment; our reward will be to share in the expected increase in the value of your company.
